content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Factory at position(-5, -65)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position(-5.0, -65.0) which processes iron ore into iron plates.
- Burner Mining Drill at position(47.0, -82.0) that extracts iron ore.
- Belt Group at position(40.5, -84.5) that transports items between entities.
- Multiple Wooden Chests at positions (46.5, -83.5), (48.5, -83.5), (5.5, -79.5), (10.5, -79.5) for item storage.

### Electricity Generator at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Steam Engine at position(0.5, 0.5) which generates electricity.
- Boiler at position(0.5, 6.0) that requires water input to produce steam.
- Pipe Groups connecting the Boiler and Steam Engine, though currently not functional due to insufficient pipes.

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to insufficient pipes
- Ensure you have enough pipes in your inventory before attempting to connect the Boiler and Steam Engine.

### Errors when placing Offshore Pump
- Cannot place Offshore Pump as it is not in inventory. Always check your inventory before attempting to place an entity.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
